gitb:config.name: treeRootNodeUrl
gitb:config.label: TREE root node
gitb:config.desc: Please provide the entry point (URL) to check for TREE compliance (TREE collection root node URL)

gitb:config.name: treeMaxNodeCount
gitb:config.label: Maximum TREE nodes
gitb:config.desc: The maximum number of TREE nodes to process when validating conformance. This limits how many nodes are verified in case of a large TREE collection. Set to 0 to verify all available TREE nodes. WARNING: setting this value to zero (0) may result in an ever running test for infinite collections.
